projectDescription: Discover the "green side" of Bali: Connect, collaborate, and contribute to creating a cleaner and greener Bali.
projectDescriptionExtended: Our application allows residents, tourists, and organizations to unite their efforts to address Bali's unique environmental challenges. Thanks to a user-friendly platform combining real-time pollution reports, geotagged clean-up events, and a supportive community, we are revolutionizing the way people take action to protect and restore the island's natural beauty.
